data.title: Peoples Bank Foundation
data.meta_description: From 2018-2023, the Peoples Bank Foundation has awarded $3 million+ to local organizations committed to Community, Youth, Human Services, Arts and Environment.
data.text:
Let us help you.

Foundation contributions are distributed across all segments of our communities to foster a lasting impact, and we continue to increase our support of local programs that help low to moderate-income individuals and families. We focus on five areas of giving and want to hear about your work and how the Foundation can aid your mission.

The deadline to submit applications for quarterly reviews are March 31, June 30, September 30 and December 1. View the Grant Qualifications and Helpful Tips sections below for assistance submitting your application.

Helpful Tips

You will be prompted to create an organization account using a valid email address and password.

You will be required to attach the following documents to your application. These documents must already be saved on your computer before you can browse and upload them.

IRS 501(c)(3) Determination letter

One-page Project Budget (if applicable)

Proposal Narrative, including a statement of purpose, project objective, target population, future plans for project or organization and any other relevant information

Key Members and/or Board Members of the organization and project

Copies of any project publications or brochures (if applicable)

Verify your information is correct before you submit. Once your application is submitted, you will not have an opportunity to make any changes.

If you have any questions, please contact [email protected].
